    Documentation Updates

    Below are documentation updates for October-December 2021.

    Index of all documentation updates

    24-December-2021

    New Docs

    • Title: Managing Audio Tracks Using the CMS API
    • Description: Use the CMS API to get, update, and delete audio tracks of your videos
    • Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/cms/managing-videos/managing-audio-tracks.html
    • Category:
    • Title: Managing Custom Fields Using the CMS API
    • Description: Use the CMS API to create, get, update, and delate custom fields for an account
    • Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/cms/managing-videos/managing-custom-fields.html
    • Category:
    • Title: Ad Intelligence Plugin
    • Description: In this topic, you will learn how to use the Ad Intelligence plugin with Brightcove Player to generate reports that provide insights into ad performance.
    • Link: https://player.support.brightcove.com/plugins/ad-intelligence-plugin.html
    • Category:
    • Title: Android: Playhead Position and Video Duration
    • Description: In this topic, you will learn about changes when using the playhead position and video duration with the Brightcove Native SDK for Android.
    • Link: https://sdks.support.brightcove.com/android/playback/playhead-position-and-video-duration.html
    • Category:
    • Title: SSAI Plugin Changes with Android SDK v6.18.0
    • Description: In this topic, you will learn about important changes to the Server-Side Ad Insertion (SSAI) plugin in the Brightcove Native SDK for Android.
    • Link: https://sdks.support.brightcove.com/android/advertising/ssai-seeking-behavior.html
    • Category:

    Major updates

    • Title: CMS API Reference
    • Description: Added operations for managing custom fields. Also corrected the maximum value for the limit parameter for the Get Videos in Playlist request - it is 100, not 1000, and also that the encoding_rates array for audio tracks is read only
    • Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/cms/references/reference.html
    • Category:
    • Title: Dynamic API Reference
    • Description: New embed_closed_caption request body field for text tracks allows them to be embedded as 608/708 captions in MP4 renditions
    • Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/dynamic-ingest/references/reference.html#tag/Ingest
    • Category:
    • Title: Playback API
    • Description: Introduction to Playback API video updated
    • Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/playback/
    • Category:
    • Title: Plugin Version Reference
    • Description: Added third-party plugin section
    • Link: https://player.support.brightcove.com/plugins/plugin-version-reference.html
    • Category:
    • Title: Overview: Brightcove Player Plugins
    • Description: Added third-party plugin section
    • Link: https://player.support.brightcove.com/plugins/overview-brightcove-player-plugins.html
    • Category:
    • Title: Overview: Brightcove Native SDK for Android
    • Description: Native SDK for Android release v6.18.0
    • Link: https://sdks.support.brightcove.com/android/basics/overview-brightcove-player-sdk-android.html
    • Category:

    Minor updates

    • Title: Viewing Billing Information
    • Description: Clarification of billing for Live DVR
    • Link: https://studio.support.brightcove.com/admin/viewing-billing-information.html
    • Category:
    • Title: TLS for Media, Player, and API URLs
    • Description: Added some notes and corrected some typos
    • Link: https://studio.support.brightcove.com/general/tls-media-player-and-api-urls.html
    • Category:
    • Title: Requesting Auto Captions
    • Description: Added note that for auto captions to be generated, the video must be at least 5 seconds long if the language is specified, 15 seconds long if auto-detect is used
    • Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/dynamic-ingest/ingest-guides/requesting-auto-captions.html
    • Category:
    • Title: Automatically Generating Captions for Videos
    • Description: Added note that for auto captions to be generated, the video must be at least 5 seconds long if the language is specified, 15 seconds long if auto-detect is used
    • Link: https://studio.support.brightcove.com/media/generating-captions-videos.html
    • Category:
    • Title: Auto Captions
    • Description: Added note that for auto captions to be generated, the video must be at least 5 seconds long if the language is specified, 15 seconds long if auto-detect is used
    • Link: https://zencoder.support.brightcove.com/encoding-settings/assets/encoding-settings-auto-captions.html
    • Category:
    • Title: Scheduling Live Events
    • Description: Update on default limit for Scheduling Live Events
    • Link: https://live.support.brightcove.com/live-module/scheduling-live-event.html
    • Category:
    • Title: Managing Live Settings
    • Description: Updated a Link to the Appropriate Website
    • Link: https://live.support.brightcove.com/admin/managing-live-settings.html
    • Category:
    • Title: Creating Custom Metadata Fields
    • Description: Document the no Way to Set a Default Value for a Custom Field
    • Link: https://studio.support.brightcove.com/admin/creating-custom-metadata-fields.html
    • Category:
    • Title: Known Issues: Studio, Brightcove Player and APIs
    • Description: Auto display of captions for Safari, information updated
    • Link: https://general.support.brightcove.com/support/known-issues-studio-brightcove-player-and-apis.html#player
    • Category:
    • Title: Autoplay Considerations
    • Description: Autoplay String Values section removed
    • Link: https://player.support.brightcove.com/playback/autoplay-considerations.html#Known_issues
    • Category:
    • Title: Advertising with the IMA3 Plugin
    • Description: Note related to IMA3 plugin version 4.0 added
    • Link: https://player.support.brightcove.com/plugins/advertising-ima3-plugin.html#section-name
    • Category:
